oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Record of the invasive alien ladybird Harmonia axyridis (Coleoptera, Coccinellidae) from Kenya
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nedvěd, Oldřich
Háva, Jiří
Kulíková, Daniela
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Coleoptera
Kenya
invasion biology
Harmonia axyridis
invasive species
Coccinellidae
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The biological control agent and alien invasive ladybird Harmonia axyridis (Pallas, 1773) was recorded for the first time in Kenya, and in equatorial Africa, in 2010.
